text:
Robert Saladrigas Riera (12 February 1940 – 22 October 2018) was a Spanish political writer, journalist and literary critic. He was known for his articles on foreign literature published in "CULTURA/S", the literary supplement of "La Vanguardia" newspaper. His literary work has been translated into Spanish, Portuguese and Romanian.
Saladrigas died in Barcelona on 22 October 2018 from prostate cancer at the age of 78.
